name: add
description: Adds a member to the guild roster.

name: class
description: Lists the class of the specified roster member *OR* Lists all roster members of the specified class.

name: demote
description: Demotes a leader to a member.

name: find
description: Lists details for a guild roster member.

name: groups
description: Lists all available groups and their members.

name: groupdetails
description: Lists in-depth details on all groups and their members.

name: join
description: Enrolls/Unenrolls a guild roster member for the current expedition.

name: joined/pool
description: Lists all members that have joined the current expedition.

name: leaderboard
description: Lists the top 10 dps or if an integer (X) is given, top X on the roster

name: promote
description: Promotes a member to a leader.

name: remove
description: Removes a member from the guild roster.

name: reset
description: The expedition groups are reset.

name: roster
description: Lists everyone on the guild roster.

name: setexpo
description: Sets whether the guild has scheduled AM/PM expeditions or an expo join window.

name: settimerenbmsg
description: Sets the timer message that will display when expos are enabled.

name: settimerdismsg
description: Sets the timer message that will display when expos are disabled.

name: setwindow
description: Sets the expedition join window to x # minutes before/after expedition start time.

name: swap
description: Swaps two guild members between two expo groups!

name: timerchadd
description: Adds a channel to the timers list.

name: timerchremove
description: Removes a channel from the timers list.

name: timers
description: Lists timer information for the guild.

name: toggleexpos
description: Toggles expedition sign-ups.

name: update
description: Updates the [class, dps, id, multiplier, name] for a member on the guild roster.
